amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities of the Second Class and Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Abandoned real estate; sale; sealed bids; deed.
amendatorysection.para: The sale shall be by sealed bids; and upon approval of the sale by a two-thirds vote of the council the mayor or chairman of the board of trustees shall, in the name of the city or village, execute and deliver a deed to the purchaser, which deed shall be attested by the city clerk; and the seal of the city shall be thereon impressed.
